title: 2018 Ford F-350 Super Duty XLT Box Truck
item_description:
2018 Ford F-350 Super Duty XLT Box Truck

Specifications

  • Year: 2018
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: F-350 Super Duty XLT
  • VIN: 1FDRF3G68JEB36796
  • License: 35781K2
    • Registration Expiration: 2/28/2025
  • Odometer Reads: 50,924
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 14,000 Lbs
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: 6.2L V8 - E85
  • Body Style: Truck
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: LT245/75R17
  • Deck Length: 144”
  • Deck Width: 90”
  • Wall Height: 70”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Gray
  • Features:
    • Bluetooth Hands-Free
    • CD Player
    • Cruise Control
    • Keyless Entry
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Steering Wheel Controls
    • Air Conditioning D
    • Dual Rear Wheels

Note: Paperwork will not be mailed to the buyer until January 2025. This vehicle has a payoff and the lien holder will release the title to the bankruptcy trustee to sign. Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once 1. the court order is received and 2. the title has been released by lienholder and signed by the bankruptcy trustee. Please allow several weeks after the removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
